sys_script.name: availabity status

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_d6a965e21bb9a950dd39ed3abc4bcbc6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_980836_car_bookings</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>availabity status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

function makeBooking() {
  var spotId = g_form.getValue('spotid');
  var start = g_form.getValue('starttime');
  var end = g_form.getValue('endtime');

  // Create a new booking record
  var booking = new GlideRecord('x_980836_car_bookings');
  booking.initialize();
  booking.setValue('spotid', spotId);
  booking.setValue('starttime', start);
  booking.setValue('endtime', end);
  booking.setValue('user', g_user.userID);
  booking.setValue('status', 'reserved');
  booking.insert();
	

  // Update the availability status of the parking spot
  var parking = new GlideRecord('x_980836_car_parkingspots');
  parking.addQuery('sysid', spotId);
  parking.query();
  if (parking.next()) {
    parking.setValue('available', false);
    parking.update();
  }
  
  // Show a success message and reload the form
  g_form.addInfoMessage('Booking successful!');
  g_form.clearMessages();
  g_form.setValues({ starttime: '', endtime: '' });
  g_form.submit();
	
}


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-28 14:01:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d6a965e21bb9a950dd39ed3abc4bcbc6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>availabity status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car" source="x_980836_car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d6a965e21bb9a950dd39ed3abc4bcbc6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-28 15:02:26</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d6a965e21bb9a950dd39ed3abc4bcbc6"/></record_update>
